subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jack McClinton made seven 3-pointers and scored 25 points in the first round of the N.I.T. as visiting Miami beat Providence, 78-66. Baylor defeated visiting Georgetown, 74-72. In the C.B.I. tournament, St. John’s lost to host Richmond, 75-69. nit.
snippet: Jack McClinton made seven 3-pointers and scored 25 points in the first round of the N.I.T. as visiting Miami beat Providence, 78-66. Baylor defeated visiting Georgetown, 74-72. In the C.B.I. tournament, St. John’s lost to host Richmond, 75-69. nit.
